Real achievement wears blue

play_arrow

Committed to Helping You Succeed

Experience a world-class education without compromise. More than 100 majors, 70+ online programs, and endless opportunity.

arrow_forward Explore More Programs

Indiana State Advantage

The Indiana State Advantage is a commitment to affordability — it's a guarantee that incoming, first-time, full-time students will graduate in four years and will enjoy the world-class, Indiana State college experience.

arrow_forward Explore More Programs

The academics at Indiana State University are top tier. It's evident from your first day on campus that all of the faculty and professors at ISU are committed to helping you succeed in any way they can.

Mark Smith | Psychology | ’20

arrow_forward Read Mark’s Story

You Belong Here

  • Student Life

    200+ student organizations, Greek life, NCAA Division I sports, and a state-of-the-art rec center. There’s always something happening.

  • Diversity Equity & Inclusion

    We’re proud to have the most diverse student body of any university in Indiana. Our warm, welcoming culture strengthens our commitment to equity and inclusion.

  • Supportive Services

    From health and wellness services to career planning and academic support, we’re here for you.

The academics at Indiana State University are top tier. It's evident from your first day on campus that all of the faculty and professors at ISU are committed to helping you succeed in any way they can.

Mark Smith | Psychology | ’20
